thread.section_title: Redspot Car Rentals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Redspot Car Rentals | redspot.com.au
thread.title: GARRY
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by GARRY

author: GARRY
title: GARRY
text: My had been booked via my Travel Agent (Hello world) in Nambucca Heads, upon arrival I checked at the Red Spot counter where I had to wait for several minutes as the previous customer did not appear very organised. When it was my turn the counter staff apologised for the wait and we moved on from there in an efficient and timely manner. The car was ready to go, i was advised of a small scratch near the drivers side mirror so not to worry about that as the staff was already aware of it. I dropped the car the next morning with a full tank of fuel as advised to do and gave the key to a friendly counter staff member. overall I was more than satisfied with the service provided plus the car itself.
